        Highlights text field red. Use to highlight a field when there is an error detected
        Parameters:

      • confirmItemDelete

        public static boolean confirmItemDelete​(java.lang.String name)
        Dialog to confirm item deletion. Present user with a dialog to confirm the deletion of the item.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the item to be deleted
        Returns:
        True or False if OK selected

      • selectionError

        public static void selectionError​(int errorCode)
        Selection error dialogs. Display selection error dialog based on error code passed.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - 1:Inventory is empty | 2: Nothing is selected

      • errorPart

        public static void errorPart​(int errorCode)
        Display error dialog. Display an error dialog based on the error code passed.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - Type of error. 1: Field empty | 2: Part type not selected | 3: Invalid format | 4: Invalid name | 5: Negative value | 6: Inventory less than minimum | 7: Inventory more than maximum | 8: Minimum higher than maximum | 9: Machine ID not number | 10: Unknown part type

      • partAssociatedDeleteError

        public static void partAssociatedDeleteError​(java.lang.String productName)
        Part associated with a product error. Display an error dialog stating that the part is associated with a product, asks user to un-associate part first.
        Parameters:
        productName - Product that the part is associated with.

      • partAlreadyAssociatedWithProductError

        public static void partAlreadyAssociatedWithProductError​(java.lang.String productName)
        Part already associated with product error. Display an error dialog stating that the part is already associated with the product.
        Parameters:
        productName - Product that the part is associated with.

      • errorAddProduct

        public static void errorAddProduct​(int errorCode)
        Display error dialog. Display an error dialog based on the error code.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - Type of error. 1: Field empty | 2: No parts associated with product | 3: Invalid format | 4: Value cannot be negative | 5: Inventory cannot be lower than minimum | 6: Inventory cannot be greater than maximum | 7: Minimum cannot be higher than maximum | 8: Cost of the product cannot be lower than the sum of the parts

      • productHasAssociatedPartsDeleteError

        public static void productHasAssociatedPartsDeleteError()
        Product has associated parts error. Display an error dialog stating that the product has associated parts, asks user to un-associate part first.
